capsules_submitted.utterance: So Flitwick is a female. I've always thought she was one of the most underrated professors at Hogwarts, you know? capsules_submitted.utterance: I've heard that Flitwick is a very supportive teacher, especially when it comes to our Transfiguration classes. He always makes sure we feel comfortable and confident in trying out new spells. I think he's an amazing professor, and his patience with us students is truly admirable.
